message: Yet another ex-GCS employee is speaking out saying "They are the laughingstock of the industry. I confronted GCS about their employee treatment and they basically said they didn't care." Read the full comment here: http://www.egypt-webdesign.com/reviews/gcs-company-review-and-why-not-to-work-in-gcssd-2.htm
